entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 over exposed coastal sections this morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 9.
